ApprovalWorkItemCriteria.name: ApprovalWorkItemCriteria
ApprovalWorkItemCriteria.description: Represents the logic by which a smart approval request is evaluated.

ApprovalStepApiName.description: The unique API name of the approval step that uses the logic in the approval work item criteria.

ApprovalWorkItemId.description: The parent approval work item associated with the approval work item criteria.

CriteriaType.description: Specifies whether the requirement logic is for an entry or exit condition.

Name.description: The sequentially-generated name of the approval work item criteria record, for example AWCR-000000071.

RequirementLogic.description: The requirement logic of all entry or exit conditions.
